content: Follow the lava path back up the archway, collecting more Fire Dates on the way, and be careful of Scorching and Searing-Fire enemies that will pop out along the way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Flint Chief'.
The content is as follows:
Follow the lava path back up the archway, collecting more Fire Dates on the way, and be careful of Scorching and Searing-Fire enemies that will pop out along the way.
